titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 108 entitled "A bill for the relief of Walter Chang" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Refers S. 108, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
